description: Creates an URL from a protocol, hostname, port, and pathname.

input.name: protocol
input.description: The protocol used to reach the target, e.g. http or https.

input.name: hostname
input.description: The domain or ip of the target.

input.name: port
input.description:
The port the host is exposing.
If unspecified, defaults to "".

input.name: pathname
input.description:
The pathname to the resource of the target.
If unspecified, defaults to "".
